topic.title: Fetal Delivery Death Causal Information - conformance rules

lines.i: The template contains information provided by the clinician to indicate the cause or causes behind the death of a fetus. The template definition draws on that used for the death certificate, but acknowledges the differences found within the fetal death report.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.51"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code that indicates that death causal information is provided.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Information regarding the initiating cause of fetal death.
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
An indication that the observation contains information regarding a specific cause of death.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Cause or Condition (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.xxxx DYNAMIC
The cause or condition which most likely began the series of events resulting in the death of the fetus is to be recorded. The information should be provided as text to fully record the provider's view of the cause. The appropriate code should be valued as well.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] component
Information regarding other significant causes or conditions contributing to fetal death.
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is CDA Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Observation
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Cause or Condition (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.xxxx DYNAMIC
All other conditions contributing to the death of the fetus should be recorded. The information should be provided as text to fully record the provider's view of the cause. The appropriate code should be valued as well.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code that indicates that death causal information is provided.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Information regarding the initiating cause of fetal death.
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
An indication that the observation contains information regarding a specific cause of death.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Cause or Condition (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.xxxx DYNAMIC
The cause or condition which most likely began the series of events resulting in the death of the fetus is to be recorded. The information should be provided as text to fully record the provider's view of the cause. The appropriate code should be valued as well.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] component
Information regarding other significant causes or conditions contributing to fetal death.
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is CDA Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Observation
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Death Cause or Condition (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.xxxx DYNAMIC
All other conditions contributing to the death of the fetus should be recorded. The information should be provided as text to fully record the provider's view of the cause. The appropriate code should be valued as well.
